General.Name: Precision Biosensor Inc.
General.Description: Precision Biosensor, Inc., an in-vitro diagnostics company, manufactures, distributes, and sells diagnostic reagents and analyzing devices in South Korea. The company offers cartridges for cardiac, infection, and brain, as well as colorectal, pregnancy, and vitamin D deficiency indications; and immunochromatographic analyzers. It also provides thermostat devices for activating the reagent reactions; and IQC analyzers. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.
